Configuration¶

All configurations for AMP2 are controlled in “config.yaml”. The default setting parameters are provided in config_def.yaml in source path.

The commands for configuration are listed below.

  • Directory
  • Program
  • Calculation
  • Vasp_parallel
  • cif2vasp
  • Convergence_test
  • Relaxation
  • Magnetic_ordering
  • Band_calculation
  • Hybrid_oneshot
  • Density_of_states
  • Dielectric
  • Effective_mass
